languages.text: {n}Конюх, застывший в дверях, не сулит вам ничего хорошего. Его грубое лицо выглядит свирепым, а в руках блестит нож для рубки мяса.{/n} "Ты лошадь выпустила, скотина? Я с тебя шкуру спущу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Конюх, застывший в дверях, не сулит вам ничего хорошего. Его грубое лицо выглядит свирепым, а в руках блестит нож для рубки мяса.{/n} "Ты лошадь выпустила, скотина? Я с тебя шкуру спущу".
{n}Конюх, застывший в дверях, не сулит вам ничего хорошего. Его грубое лицо выглядит свирепым, а в руках блестит нож для рубки мяса.{/n} "Ты лошадь выпустила, скотина? Я с тебя шкуру спущу".

languages.text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is a meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

{n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway promises nothing good for you. The man's face is brutal, and a meat cleaver glints in his hand.{/n} "Not so noisy anymore, are you, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

{n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

languages.text: {n}马夫出现在了门口，这对你来说不是什么好事。那个人一脸横肉，手里拿着一把闪着寒光的切肉刀。{/n}“你这个小臭婊子，你把马放跑了？我要活剥了你的皮。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is a meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}马夫出现在了门口，这对你来说不是什么好事。那个人一脸横肉，手里拿着一把闪着寒光的切肉刀。{/n}“你这个小臭婊子，你把马放跑了？我要活剥了你的皮。”

languages.text: {n}La aparición del mozo de cuadra en el umbral no te augura nada bueno. El hombre tiene una expresión cruel y empuña un reluciente cuchillo de hoja ancha.{/n} «Has soltado al caballo, ¿verdad, fulana? Te voy a desollar viva».
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is a meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}La aparición del mozo de cuadra en el umbral no te augura nada bueno. El hombre tiene una expresión cruel y empuña un reluciente cuchillo de hoja ancha.{/n} «Has soltado al caballo, ¿verdad, fulana? Te voy a desollar viva».

languages.text: {n}Kapı eşiğinde duran seyisin görüntüsü senin için iyiye işaret değil. Adamın yüzü vahşi, elinde de parlayan bir satır var.{/n} "Yaptın yapacağını, değil mi küçük fahişe? Derini canlı canlı yüzeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is a meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kapı eşiğinde duran seyisin görüntüsü senin için iyiye işaret değil. Adamın yüzü vahşi, elinde de parlayan bir satır var.{/n} "Yaptın yapacağını, değil mi küçük fahişe? Derini canlı canlı yüzeceğim."

languages.text: {n}戸口に立っている馬飼いの視野はあなたにとってろくな事がない前兆である。男の顔はカンカンに怒っており、彼の手には肉切り大包丁が握られ輝いている。{/n}「もうそんなにうるさくないな。娘っ子？生きたまま皮を剥いでやろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is meat cleaver.{/n} "Not so noisy anymore, are you, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}戸口に立っている馬飼いの視野はあなたにとってろくな事がない前兆である。男の顔はカンカンに怒っており、彼の手には肉切り大包丁が握られ輝いている。{/n}「もうそんなにうるさくないな。娘っ子？生きたまま皮を剥いでやろう」

languages.text: {n}La silhouette du palefrenier dans l'encadrement de la porte ne présage rien de bon ; sans même tenir compte de son expression pour le moins barbare, vous remarquez immédiatement le scintillement inquiétant d'un fendoir à viande.{/n} « Tu as libéré le cheval, petite traînée ? Je vais t'écorcher vive, moi, tu vas voir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is a meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette du palefrenier dans l'encadrement de la porte ne présage rien de bon ; sans même tenir compte de son expression pour le moins barbare, vous remarquez immédiatement le scintillement inquiétant d'un fendoir à viande.{/n} « Tu as libéré le cheval, petite traînée ? Je vais t'écorcher vive, moi, tu vas voir. »

languages.text: {n}Der Anblick des Stallburschen im Türrahmen verheißt nichts Gutes für dich. Der Mann macht ein wütendes Gesicht. In seiner Hand funkelt ein Hackbeil.{/n} "Hast du das Pferd losgebunden? Ich werde dir die Haut abziehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the stable hand standing in the doorway portends nothing good for you. The man's face is savage, and glinting in his hand is a meat cleaver.{/n} "You let the horse loose, you little wench? I'll skin you alive."
